title: FS: 1887 N284 Big Sam Thompson HOF SGC NLA
author: Moonlight Graham

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 N284 Big Sam Thompson HOF SGC NLA
posts.post_content:
Nice card of a tough hall of famer. I'm not sure if this was a blank back version, or if it has scrapbook damage. But it does have a cool stamp on the back. Also the card is trimmed a little bit. But it still displays nicely. Price is NLA delivered paypal friends and family. Thank you for looking and Happy New Year!!
Joe
